column5: for a lot of guys most items have already been addressed, spinner -baits,  rapala's and most softies. ths sale [from my perspective ] covers a lot more .   reels [ of better quality at decent savings]lures at fair value . even if you didn't come to spend a lot of money on specific items , bps sales  are always a good time .[especially]  if you're in the area.] why not? you work hard .? right? it's only a couple hun... birthday 's comin' up right? honey,,,,,i don't ask for much ,,,,, down in flames ...... orry the kids need new shoes... just when you thought it  was safe to bring out the bps card ,,,,, boom,,,,," credit on condition. "she has made new rules... if you promise to.......   and then promise to......then you can go fishing with your new fishing stuff. that's why we men invented ......ICEFISHING........fewer chores to do in the winter.... more time to fish.
I can't imagine how dangerous this sale is for relationships.  it actually starts on friday.  the sale flier is posted on the BPS website for vaughan.
Always remember and never forget... tis far easier to beg for forgiveness than it is to ask for permission!

I need a bunch of stuff for the Boat this year.... I am also in NEED of a couple of F1's...  Looks like I will be spending closer to a G-Note by the time I get outta there.... God I hate sales. LOL  G

Looking forward to it not because there are amazing deals going on but because its a sign that spring is near.  Although you could never tell by walking outside in the GTA...  Going to get some crank baits, the 3 bank charger and probably some other things for the boat.
Hmmff... the last time we were in the wife spent WAY more than I did...  I am looking at one of these though??

You guys are so cruel.  Having never been to BPS and hearing all this great stuff drives me nuts.  Even though I don't have the party tickets to buy anything, I'm sure I would find something.  One day I will loose my virginity.  Oh how I wish I lived closer.

Darren's shopping list  Jr Thundersticks on sale = Spring Browns Tail Dancers                 = Fall Quinte Eyes NK's                             = Summer Salmon Reef Runners                = Summer Erie Eyes.    A bit for every season!!
Are you gonna throw out the ones you bought last year Darren... or grab another set of trays?
Hey folks, I'll be in the Fishing Dept on the weekends for the Classic.  Stop by to say hi.

I will not ask for permission nor will I beg forgiveness you see in the last 4 months my wife has been to Florida(10 days) and Jamaica(7 days) and this summer she going to England for 17 days you add all that up and it`s a heck of a lot more than I will spend on fishing stuff I don`t really need.
